baseDir.description: Path to directory where to search for the glossary file and markdown files. All paths in a config file will be relative to *baseDir*. *baseDir* itself is relative to the location of the config file or the current working directory when provided via command line.

baseUrl.description: The base url to use when creating absolute links to glossary.

excludeFiles.description: An array of files or file name patterns that should not be included in any processing.

experimentalFootnotes.description: Enable support for markdown footnotes as defined in https://pandoc.org/MANUAL.html#footnotes. Footnotes are considered 'experimental' until they become part of the CommonMark Specification at https://spec.commonmark.org.

force.description: Choose true, only if you know the consequences.

glossaries.description: An array of glossaries. Allows for different kinds of glossaries and definitions.

ignoreCase.description: Find and link every occurrence of a term no matter how it is spelled.

includeFiles.description: Path or glob patterns of files to include for linking to glossaries.

indexing.description: Path or glob patterns of files to include for linking to glossaries.

keepRawFiles.description: Glob patterns for (markdown) files to copy from 'baseDir' to 'outDir' but to ignore by the linker. Non-markdown files will be ignored anyways.

linking.description: Whether to use relative or absolute links. Choosing 'absolute' requires a 'baseUrl'.

outDir.description: Path to directory where to write processed files to.

reportNotMentioned.description: Report on terms which exist in a glossary but have neither been mentioned directly nor with any of its aliases.

indexFile.description: Generate a file with a list of glossary terms and where they have been used.

oneOf.description: String value range is deprecated and will be removed with v4. Use object notation instead.

listOfFigures.description: Generate a file with a list of figures and where they can be found.

file.description: Path relative to 'outDir' where to create the index markdown file.

title.description: The page title for the index file. If missing the application uses a default value.

groupByHeadingDepth.description: Level of detail by which to group occurrences of terms or syntactic elements in generated files (Range [min; max] = [0; 9]). For example, use 0 to not group at all; 1 to group things at the level of document titles, etc. Configures the indexer. The option affects any files generated from the internal AST node index.

file.description: Name of the glossary file. Conventional default is 'glossary.md'

termHint.description: A symbol to append to a link to denote that the term refers to a glossary term.

termsFile.description: File where to write term book to. Enables testing the term extraction results of terminator.

reproducablePaths.description: Write system-independent paths into 'termsFile' to produce reproducable output accross environments.

printInputAst.description: Print the AST of scanned markdown documents prior to linkification. May be a Regex to only print AST for particular document.

printOutputAst.description: Print the AST of scanned markdown documents after linkification. May be a Regex to only print AST for particular document.
